convert descriptor terms to igraph object

Source: R/teaming_descriptors.R
descriptor_terms_as_igraph.Rd

convert descriptor terms to igraph object

Usage

descriptor_terms_as_igraph(obj)

Arguments

obj

a descriptor_terms data.frame (usually from descriptor_terms)

Value

an igraph object

Examples

dterms = descriptor_terms()
#> ✔ Reading from Bridge2AI Leaf Nodes Tests.
#> ✔ Range ''Dictionary''.

g = descriptor_terms_as_igraph(dterms)

g
#> IGRAPH 85d2feb DN-- 61 60 -- 
#> + attr: name (v/c), color (v/c)
#> + edges from 85d2feb (vertex names):
#>  [1] root          ->Data             root          ->Infrastructure  
#>  [3] root          ->People           Data          ->Findable        
#>  [5] Data          ->Accessible       Data          ->Interoperable   
#>  [7] Data          ->Reusable         Data          ->Reliable        
#>  [9] Data          ->Transparent      Infrastructure->Community-driven
#> [11] Infrastructure->Tested           Infrastructure->Durable         
#> [13] People        ->Diversity        People        ->Equity          
#> [15] People        ->Inclusion       
#> + ... omitted several edges

if(require(visNetwork)) {
  visNetwork::visIgraph(g)
}
#> Loading required package: visNetwork
